text: Mammillaria sanchez-mejoradae is a species of plant in the family Cactaceae. It is endemic to Nuevo León state of northeastern Mexico. Its natural habitat is hot deserts. It is a Critically endangered species, threatened by habitat loss. ==References== sanchez-mejoradae Category:Cacti of Mexico Category:Endemic flora of Mexico Category:Flora of Nuevo León Category:Critically endangered plants Category:Endangered biota of Mexico Category:Taxonomy articles created by Polbot Category:Plants described in 1992
title: Mammillaria sanchez-mejoradae
